job description:
About Us
CiberSQL is an Information Technology firm established in 2005 that provides a wide range of services including Cloud Migration, Mobile Application Development, System Integration, and Custom Application Development. We are a full-service consulting company with simple mission: deliver quality software and dependable customer service. Currently, we serve two major health systems and develop a variety of software applications and systems, but we plan to grow both our client base and our application areas.

Responsibilities:
  • Create mapping and workflows using Informatica to extract, transform and load data from DB2 into CosmosDB.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve data issues.
  • Analyze queries to maximize performance.
  • Optimize ETL batch jobs for maximum performance.

Job Requirements:
  • Hands on experience with Informatica Power Center ,Power exchange Data Integration tools.
  • Experience on development experience in data management/integration - Informatica as ETL/ELT Tool.
  • Must have strong understanding and ability to script in SQL
  • Extensive knowledge of data integration and processing including extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL).
  • Experience with ETL tools, such as informatica
  • Familiar and experience with different types of databases such as DB2, SQL, CosmosDB
  • Experience with data access performance tuning and performance optimization.
